[console_scripts]
nait = nanaimo.cli:main

[nanaimo]
nanaimo_builtin_bar = nanaimo.builtin.nanaimo_bar
nanaimo_builtin_bkprecision = nanaimo.instruments.bkprecision
nanaimo_builtin_cmd = nanaimo.builtin.nanaimo_cmd
nanaimo_builtin_gather = nanaimo.builtin.nanaimo_gather
nanaimo_builtin_gtest = nanaimo.builtin.gtest_over_jlink
nanaimo_builtin_nanaimo_serial_watch = nanaimo.builtin.nanaimo_serial_watch
nanaimo_builtin_saleae = nanaimo.instruments.saleae
nanaimo_builtin_scp = nanaimo.builtin.nanaimo_scp
nanaimo_builtin_ssh = nanaimo.builtin.nanaimo_ssh
nanaimo_builtin_ykush = nanaimo.instruments.ykush
nanaimo_display = nanaimo.display

[pytest11]
pytest_gtest_over_jlink = nanaimo.builtin.gtest_over_jlink
pytest_nanaimo = nanaimo.pytest.plugin
pytest_nanaimo_bar = nanaimo.builtin.nanaimo_bar
pytest_nanaimo_cmd = nanaimo.builtin.nanaimo_cmd
